tool_description: Zloadr Professional API endpoints for Due Diligence score and reports. This category currently includes 6 endpoints:
name: Due Diligence
title: Due Diligence

api_list.name: Tokens_Score
api_list.description: Returns all static due Due Diligence for one or more cryptocurrencies including name, symbol, id, and its various registered URLs.   pass one or more comma-separated cryptocurrency symbols. Example: "ETH,BTC".
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://zloadr-due-diligence-v1.p.rapidapi.com/RapidAPI/due_diligence/token_score?symbol=BTC,ETH"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "zloadr-due-diligence-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: ICOs_Score
